page.title: 13RECREATION VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Sawley Village Hall. Built in 1927 of wood construction at a cost of Â£235 with an expected life span of 25 years. Still in use in l985. l93O-45 used for Snooker, Badminton, Old Time Dances which were attended by convalescent soldiers from Grantley Hall. Red Cross Needlework for soldiers attended by 2O village women. l985 - run by a Committee of 2O villagers. Organisations using Hall Womens Institute, Young Farmers, School, Church, Youth Club. Monthly Whist and Domino Drives, Discos for under l6 years. Annual Sports Day on Village Green since l977 with Hall used for teas. Fund raising to erect new Village Hall commenced August l985 with Barbecue and Dance which raised Â£9OO.
